entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Buffalo Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:49 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Buffalo Narrows Airport 2:54 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.9°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
